DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the effects of dexmedetomidine and esmolol given intravenously before intubation on sympathetic response caused by intubation itself. Half the patients will recevice dexmedetomidine and the other half will receive dexmedetomidine. Ischemia modified albumine levels will be measured
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing elective surgery under general anesthesia Patient refusal Morbid obesity (BMI>30) Advanced systemic disease Hypoalbumiemia betablocker usage Anticipated difficult ventilation and/or intubation
DOC.keyword: intubation, ischemia modified albumine, dexmedetomidine, esmolol
